body: I think that they didn't release chap. 21 earlier because they wanted to release both 21 and 22 at the same time so that the sex scene wouldn't get cut by the different upload time. Like, we wouldn't wait for the next chapter. Also, I really like this new girl. She really enjoyed the MC's dick there. Hope to see her in more chapters but can't wait what Eun-jung sunbae is going to do.
New girl is the best girl and no one will change it for me
That new girl sure is something.

got to love the idiots who dont understand how a webtoon works. its a strip of pages because its meant to be one long page. you could break up this one into a normal doujin style though so not a webtoon fit.

like how the super buff dude thats usually the ass hole in these is just a bro while the other guy is getting his ego kicked in. though im expecting him to do something very bad at some point. either kidnapping or raping one of the girls. hope he gets kicked out and arrested if something like that happens.
I have been following this and it is defnitely my fave pornwha now.
Good stuff. Next chapter hopefully she gets fucked by the mc

Ay bois and girls, nhentai doesn't update chapters of sextudy as soon as they come out. You should probably find another website dedicated for pornhwas if you like this one.
